item.title: Street performance clean up - Upwork
item.description:
I need fast turnaround to clean up a piano street performance.   I want to reduce the voices not necesarily eliminate them as it makes it clear that theres people watching and its unscripted.  Mostly want to enhance the piano piece and make it crisper and improved performance.   Also there is a section with a kid running and hitting the glass makes two loud bangs I want to remove the bang sound completely as its distracting.   Also want to eliminate or reduce the thumping noise from the pedal if possible.  Theres also a loud car in middle of video would like to reduce or eliminate that sound as well


Posted On: June 22, 2024 03:57 UTC
Category: Audio Editing
Skills:Audio Restoration, Audio Editing, Adobe Audition, Audio Post Production, Adobe Photoshop, Noise Reduction, iZotope RX, Audio Engineering, Waves Audio, Asana, Audio Production, Podcast, Podcast Editing, Audio File Format, Split Audio File
Skills: Audio Restoration, Audio Editing, Adobe Audition, Audio Post Production, Adobe Photoshop, Noise Reduction, iZotope RX, Audio Engineering, Waves Audio, Asana, Audio Production, Podcast, Podcast Editing, Audio File Format, Split Audio File
Country: United States

item.title: Vital Tiktok video - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for someone to help me create a parody video of the "Looking for a Man in Finance" meme song for TikTok, but related to a different category within our industry. The goal is to produce a short, funny video that has the potential to go viral. I will provide the ideas and concepts, and you will bring it all together. It doesn’t need to be long—just hilarious and shareable.

Could you share some examples of viral TikTok videos you've worked on and their outcomes? Thanks!

Hourly Range: $25.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 03:52 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography, Music Video, Digital Video, Video Upload, Photo Slideshow, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Videography, Music Video, Digital Video, Video Upload, Photo Slideshow, Adobe Premiere Pro
Country: Australia

item.title: Add Motion Graphics And Text To YouTube Video - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for someone to add motion graphics, effects, and sound effects to my YouTube videos. These videos are between 10-4 minutes in length and should be delivered within a week.

This is a 2 camera set up and I have the video edited, background music added, and color graded. The only thing you need to do is add the finishing touches.

These videos are mostly in the finance niche but there can be some lifestyle videos added in as well. I can show you examples of videos that I am looking to replicate as well as an attached script for specific graphics (text mostly) I would like inserted.

The project would be at a rate of $75 per week for one video.

Please let me know if you have any questions as well as provide a link to your previous work.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 22, 2024 03:51 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: UGC Video Content Creator with Australian Accent (no editors, we're looking for models) - Upwork
item.description:
We're looking for a few UGC Content Creators for our marketing agency.

As a UGC Content Creator, you need to follow the script provided to you and record the raw video ad in square format (1080x1080).

The ad should closely follow the provided video script. Attention to detail is crucial to ensure the ad matches the video content accurately.

You only need to replicate the script and the cuts. You do not need to do any of the graphic editing.

This can be completed in an hour or two.

Requirements
- Portfolio of previous work
- Quick turnaround time
- Proficient in English

Apply and I shoot you a message with the script and instructions if you qualify.

Budget: $100
Posted On: June 22, 2024 03:49 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:UGC, Video Production
Skills: UGC, Video Production
Country: AUS
click to apply

item.title: Video editor for for anime recap youtube channel ($20/video) - Upwork
item.description:
Hey!

I am looking for a professional to create / edit one YouTube video about an anime for anime recap channel.

The length of the video should be between 28-31 minutes long and pay $20 dollar per video.



I will provide the script and voice over. (You will not have to do any research regarding the video topic for the video, you will have to find clips/photos/background music/etc to create the video).


I am are looking for someone who:

- Has experience/work in creating social media video content, especially YouTube videos.

-can edit adult/sexual  content out of video and verify video is not ads limited

- Has experience using video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro

- Fluent in English

- Able to work within the deadline (48 hours)

- The style should adhere to our brand guidelines.

However, you can be very creative to make the video entertaining and engaging.


If you have read the middle of this job description, please type your favorite animal at the beginning or end of your proposal.


Video examples:


https://youtu.be/YG5lOLsHD1w?si=8bi4_EDAHYzpnA8l
https://youtu.be/zdTG9P2oEOI?si=thsypk7N-Cl1eJ0P

Also, if you’ve ever made a YouTube Cash Cow video in the anime recap niche, please attach samples of your work.


I look forward to hopefully working with you!

Budget: $20
Posted On: June 22, 2024 03:46 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Production
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Videography Shoot for Non-profit Organization | Detroit, Michigan Area - Upwork
item.description:
We need a talented videographer to shoot at their a couple locations in Detroit — Near the Boston Edison District.

Estimated Project Time: 4-6 hours for two shoot locations.

We need a professional that can step in and take the lead from a video strategy and filming perspective.

If you are interested, please submit your proposal and we will set up a video meeting to meet. This will allow us to hear more about your background and provide additional details for the shoot.

Once accepted and hired, we can share you with all brand details and assets ‘

We're a cause-driven digital marketing agency based out of Detroit.

Hourly Range: $15.00-$55.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 03:40 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Videography, Video Production, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States

item.title: If you have a RABBIT, please apply to this project - Upwork
item.description:
If you have a rabbit, please apply to this project.
I need the help of someone who can record their rabbit while the rabbit is making sounds (purring, honking, oinking). It should include both audio and video.
Basically, I need you to record all the four seconds in the video below:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_7TL2W1scbo

If you're interested, please attach a picture of your rabbit.
Note: The difficulty of this project is that rabbits don't make much sound. So you should wait until they make the sounds and have the camera ready to record them.

Thank you

Hourly Range: $7.00-$32.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 03:34 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:English, Animals & Pets, Social Work, Creative Writing, Writing, Video Production, Editing & Proofreading, Videography, Photography, Pet Photography, Pets, Pet Supplies, Animals, Microsoft Word, Microsoft Excel, Data Entry

Country: United States
